results.title: Enterprise in steam
results.creator_credit: John Dick, Brian Bosisto and Bosisto Productions
results.brief_description: The story of the Pichi Pichi Railway Preservation Society and their efforts in re-opening 32 kilometres of historical railway track at Quorn in South Australia’s northern region. Apart from showing the restoration of steam locomotive carriages and bridges the film shows the spirit of enterprise in a community

results.title: Enso: El Nino Southern Oscillation
results.brief_description: A very brief and effective diagrammatic explanation of ENSO, or the “El Nino” effect which periodically reverses the normal weather patterns of the Eastern Australian-Indonesian areas and South America. ENSO lasts about a year and weakens the usual easterly trade winds which bring warm air and rainfall so that the rain then falls mid-Pacific.

results.title: Enoch Arden
results.brief_description: Adapted from Lord Tennyson’s poem, it tells the story of a man’s love for his wife, which is so strong, he sacrifices his happiness for her good. Cast includes Wilfred Lucas, Linda Arvidson.

results.title: English children: life in the city
results.brief_description: Junior grade, social studies film showing English family life in the City of York, stressing daily activities of the children. Points out aspects of English home life and presents authentic events in a modern school, on the playground, at a cricket match, and at a grocery store. Concludes with a family holiday trip by train to a nearby seaside resort.

results.title: English and Dutch colonization in the new world
results.brief_description: Reconstructs the beginnings of settlement in an English agricultural colony in Virginia, a Dutch trading colony in New York, and a Pilgrim colony in Massachusetts, and explains some of the basic motivations and patterns of colonisation.

results.title: England-Australia on kerosene: Vicker's Viscount is amazing aircraft
results.brief_description: Cinesound Review No. 1198 newsreel. The story of the first Vickers Viscount aircraft bought in England for Trans Australia Airlines. The flight to Australia from London was made at 22,000 feet via Rome, Athens, Beirut, Karachi, Delhi, Singapore, Darwin and Melbourne and completed in an hour less than two days flying time.

results.title: Engineering electronics. No. 3. The Triode: amplification
results.brief_description: This film reviews the diode principle; compares the diode and the triode; explains the triode amplifier circuit, amplification of DC voltage changes, amplification of AC voltages, distortion, and amplification of audio-frequency signals.
